examples.example: 我们每天都要保持快乐积极的心态面对生活。

translate.english: We should keep a happy and positive attitude towards life every day.

examples.example: 和家人在一起的时候总是充满了快乐。

translate.english: When being with family, it is always filled with happiness.

examples.example: 和朋友们一起玩耍真是太快乐啦。

translate.english: Playing with friends is really so happy.
